structure.unit: RIOT, DISORDERLY CONDUCT, AND RELATED OFFENSES

text.section: A person is guilty of inciting to riot when he incites or urges five (5) or more persons to create or engage in a riot.
Inciting to riot is a Class A misdemeanor.

law.history: Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 406, sec. 214, effective January 1, 1975.
